title: Epistemic Constitutionalism Or: how to avoid coherence bias

title: VisTIRA: Closing the Image-Text Modality Gap in Visual Math Reasoning via Structured Tool Integration
raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.14440v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Vision-language models (VLMs) lag behind text-only language models on mathematical reasoning when the same problems are presented as images rather than text.
